arm.transformationDescription:
[npc.her] fingers are the first to change as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the skin around [npc.her] didgets start to tear and fuse into three chitin covered apendiges. Meanwhile the skin around [npc.her] arms [npc.verb(start)] to feel num and turn gray as it seems to tighten around [npc.her] arms. Then suddenly [npc.her] once normal skin starts to rip and tear revealing [npc.armFullDescription].
As the final peaces of your old skin fall off your arms, [npc.nameIsFull] is left with chitnus, [style.boldHyena(spitbug arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have formed into chitnus, spitbug hands, complete with three fingers and tough, armoured palms.
